verses.text: \w Now|strong="H3117"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w was|strong="H1732"\w* \w old|strong="H2204"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w advanced|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w years|strong="H3117"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w was|strong="H1732"\w* \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* \w with|strong="H0935"\w* \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*, \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w was|strong="H1732"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* warm.

\w His|strong="H1961"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w therefore|strong="H1961"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*: \w Let|strong="H1961"\w* \w us|strong="H6440"\w* \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* \w for|strong="H1245"\w* \w our|strong="H1961"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w young|strong="H5291"\w* \w virgin|strong="H1330"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w let|strong="H1961"\w* \w her|strong="H1961"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w cherish|strong="H2436"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w sleep|strong="H7901"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w bosom|strong="H2436"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w warm|strong="H2552"\w* \w our|strong="H1961"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w So|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H0935"\w* \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* \w a|strong="H4672"\w* \w beautiful|strong="H3303"\w* \w young|strong="H5291"\w* \w woman|strong="H5291"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* coasts \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H0935"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* Abisag \w a|strong="H4672"\w* Sunamitess, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* damsel \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w exceeding|strong="H3966"\w* \w beautiful|strong="H3303"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w she|strong="H3808"\w* slept \w with|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*: \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w served|strong="H8334"\w* \w him|strong="H3045"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w her|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* Adonias \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Haggith|strong="H2294"\w* exalted \w himself|strong="H6440"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* \w king|strong="H4427"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w himself|strong="H6440"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w run|strong="H7323"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w Neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* rebuke \w him|strong="H3205"\w* \w at|strong="H3117"\w* \w any|strong="H1571"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Why|strong="H4069"\w* hast thou \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w*? \w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* beautiful, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* next \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w birth|strong="H3205"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H0310"\w* \w conferred|strong="H1697"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w the|strong="H0310"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Sarvia, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w Abiathar|strong="H0054"\w* \w the|strong="H0310"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w who|strong="H3548"\w* \w furthered|strong="H5826"\w* Adonias’s \w side|strong="H5973"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* Sadoc \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Banaias \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joiada|strong="H3077"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Semei, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Rei|strong="H7472"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* strength \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w David’s|strong="H1732"\w* army \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* Adonias.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* Adonias \w having|strong="H4428"\w* slain rams \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w calves|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* fat \w cattle|strong="H1241"\w* \w by|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zoheleth|strong="H2120"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w near|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* fountain Rogel, \w invited|strong="H7121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Juda, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*:

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, \w and|strong="H0251"\w* Banaias, \w and|strong="H0251"\w* all \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w valiant|strong="H1368"\w* \w men|strong="H1368"\w*, \w and|strong="H0251"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w invited|strong="H7121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Bethsabee \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*: Hast thou \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* Adonias \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Haggith|strong="H2294"\w* reigneth, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* knoweth \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*?

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w then|strong="H6258"\w* \w come|strong="H4994"\w*, \w take|strong="H3289"\w* \w my|strong="H6258"\w* \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w save|strong="H4422"\w* thy \w life|strong="H5315"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*.

\w Go|strong="H0935"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w get|strong="H0935"\w* thee \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: Didst \w not|strong="H3808"\w* thou, \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* \w O|strong="H0859"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w swear|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* thy \w handmaid|strong="H0519"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*? \w why|strong="H4069"\w* \w then|strong="H0935"\w* doth Adonias \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*?

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w while|strong="H5750"\w* thou art \w yet|strong="H5750"\w* \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w fill|strong="H4390"\w* \w up|strong="H0935"\w* thy \w words|strong="H1697"\w*.

\w So|strong="H0935"\w* Bethsabee \w went|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w chamber|strong="H2315"\w*: \w now|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w old|strong="H2204"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* Abisag \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Sunamitess \w ministered|strong="H8334"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*.

Bethsabee \w bowed|strong="H7812"\w* \w herself|strong="H7812"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* worshipped \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*. \w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w her|strong="H0559"\w*: \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* thy \w will|strong="H4428"\w*?

\w She|strong="H1931"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w lord|strong="H3068"\w*, thou didst \w swear|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* thy \w handmaid|strong="H0519"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* Adonias reigneth, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* thou, \w my|strong="H3045"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, knowest \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w it|strong="H3045"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3808"\w* hath killed \w oxen|strong="H7794"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* fat \w cattle|strong="H7794"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w many|strong="H7230"\w* rams, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w invited|strong="H7121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Abiathar|strong="H0054"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w general|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w army|strong="H6635"\w*: \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w invited|strong="H7121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w now|strong="H0310"\w*, \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* \w O|strong="H0859"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* thee, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* thou shouldst \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*, \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w after|strong="H0310"\w* thee.

Otherwise \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w pass|strong="H1961"\w*, \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* \w the|strong="H0589"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* sleepeth \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, \w that|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* counted \w offenders|strong="H2400"\w*.

\w As|strong="H0935"\w* \w she|strong="H5973"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* \w yet|strong="H5750"\w* \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w here|strong="H2009"\w*. \w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w was|strong="H0776"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* worshipped, \w bowing|strong="H7812"\w* \w down|strong="H7812"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*,

\w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w My|strong="H5921"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* \w O|strong="H0859"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, hast thou \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: Let Adonias \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* let \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*?

\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w gone|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* hath killed \w oxen|strong="H7794"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w fatlings|strong="H4806"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w many|strong="H7230"\w* rams, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w invited|strong="H7121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w army|strong="H6635"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Abiathar|strong="H0054"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w eating|strong="H0398"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w drinking|strong="H8354"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w God|strong="H0559"\w* save \w king|strong="H4428"\w* Adonias:

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w me|strong="H7121"\w* thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Sadoc \w the|strong="H0589"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Banaias \w the|strong="H0589"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joiada|strong="H3077"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w invited|strong="H7121"\w*.

\w Is|strong="H2088"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w out|strong="H3045"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* hast thou \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w told|strong="H1697"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w should|strong="H0518"\w* \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*?
